member.name: M:Clinic_Management_System.Controllers.UsersController.CreateUser(Clinic_Management_System.DTOs.Auth.UserCreateRequestDto)
member.summary: Creates a new user with the specified role. Allowed roles are "Doctor" and "Receptionist". When creating a Doctor user, additional doctor-specific fields are required and a entity will be created.
member.param: The containing user and role information.
member.returns: Returns 200 OK with created user info on success, 400 BadRequest for validation errors, or 409 Conflict if a user with the same email already exists.
